abstract: Judge Jed S. Rakoff wants to add the compensation expert to a settlement between the bank and the Securities and Exchange Commission.
snippet: Judge Jed S. Rakoff wants to add the compensation expert to a settlement between the bank and the Securities and Exchange Commission.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America says it is opposed to a judge’s proposal to appoint an outside compensation consultant as part of a settlement with the Securities and Exchange Commission.

headline.main: Bank of America Opposes Judge’s Proposal for an Outside Pay Consultant
headline.print_headline: Bank of America Opposes Judge’s Proposal for an Outside Pay Consultant

abstract: The suit, brought by several of the largest financial companies, challenges MBIA’s move to split into two units.
snippet: The suit, brought by several of the largest financial companies, challenges MBIA’s move to split into two units.
lead_paragraph: A New York judge refused on Wednesday to dismiss a lawsuit that claims MBIA took illegal steps to cut the chances that it would have to pay off on bond insurance policies.

headline.main: Judge Denies a Dismissal in a Suit Against MBIA
headline.print_headline: Judge Denies a Dismissal In a Suit Against MBIA

abstract: The Senate and the Obama administration are nearing agreement on forming a council of regulators, led by the Treasury secretary, to identify systemic risk to the nation’s financial system, officials said Wednesday.
snippet: The Senate and the Obama administration are nearing agreement on forming a council of regulators, led by the Treasury secretary, to identify systemic risk to the nation’s financial system, officials said Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: The Senate and the Obama administration are nearing agreement on forming a council of regulators, led by the Treasury secretary, to identify systemic risk to the nation’s financial system, officials said Wednesday, Sewell Chan reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: Agreement Is Near on New Banking Risk Overseer

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York

abstract: A New York judge refused on Wednesday to dismiss a lawsuit that claims MBIA took illegal steps to cut the chances that it would have to pay off on bond insurance policies, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: A New York judge refused on Wednesday to dismiss a lawsuit that claims MBIA took illegal steps to cut the chances that it would have to pay off on bond insurance policies, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: A New York judge refused on Wednesday to dismiss a lawsuit that contends MBIA took illegal steps to reduce the likelihood that it would have to pay off on bond insurance policies.

headline.main: Judge Denies a Dismissal in Suit Against MBIA
